definition: disposed to venture or take risks
details:
adjective
- disposed to venture or take risks
= example: disposed to venture or take risks
= synonyms: daring
- unrestrained by convention or propriety
= example: unrestrained by convention or propriety
= synonyms: barefaced, bodacious, bald-faced, brassy, brazen, brazen-faced, insolent
- invulnerable to fear or intimidation
= example: invulnerable to fear or intimidation
= synonyms: fearless, brave, dauntless, hardy, intrepid, unfearing
